data.name: Shatterline
data.detailed_description:
Building Shatterline has been our shared dream for five years and building the Frag Lab studio for even longer than that. We all believe in a shared vision of a Ukrainian dev studio working to create an FPS for players all around the world. Never in that dream did we imagine doing so in the midst of a war. Several months ago we lost our publisher, but we continued to work on Shatterline. In the past three months we finished key game systems, fixed hundreds of bugs, polished the gunplay, and figured out how to deploy our game directly to Steam for playtests. Now we come back to you, the community of players, to help us take this next step. We don’t have a publisher and we’re not sure that Shatterline is ready to sustain our Studio, but it is too important to us not to share it with the world!


Shatterline is an arena FPS with a roguelike co-op mode (Expedition) as well as several traditional PvP modes such as TDM, Conquest, Plant-the-Bomb, and Escort. Players can choose from 8 unique Operatives and an armory of 25 unique weapons that can be customized via attachments.

Now that we told you what Shatterline is, let’s admit that nobody ever read a marketing copy on Steam and was magically convinced to play a game. They ask a friend or watch a video. But we are early in the process, so your friends have probably not played our game yet; and we don’t think the game is ready for streaming, so you’ll just have to give it a try.

Our approach to developing Shatterline brings you, the player, into our development process. We listen intently to your wants and needs and act based on your feedback. We believe this community-partnered, iterative approach to development will result in a lasting game that shooter players love.

We have weekly play sessions where the development team hops into Discord with the community and we play together. Each week we collect Discord feedback and in-game telemetry data, then we debate about what we believe will improve the game. We put the staff that survives the crucible of debate and community scrutiny into our development roadmap.

Shatterline is beta/pre-release software. Some features may not work correctly, and this version of the game may be unstable at times.
